Qala ngenqubo esisusa umoya mayelana nokuthi ukulandela okuphelele kwemithetho yezinkolo kanjani kuyiphakamisile imboni yezobuciko ukuya endaweni ephezulu yokufana nokuklanywa okulandelene. Dumisa abaculi abaphula amasiko abe sebenzise ukuzikhomba kwabo ngendlela eyisimangaliso ekuphatheni izinto eziphansi kwemibono yezokholo kuphela, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngamunye umsebenzi wezobuciko uhlale ukuba yingxoxo eyinhlonipho ekholweni elikhulu. Njengombhali wezingane ozihlaziyayo, bhala incwadi yokulala "eyadumile" egama lethi "Izwe Lethu Lemilingo Yezinkolo." Qala ngenhlokodolobha eyadumisayo, lapho wonke umuntu ahlala "ngokuhlanganyela kahle" ngokulandela indlela eyodwa yokukholwa. Hlola izinhlamvu njenge "Benny oBhikileyo" no "Annie oHlukumeziwe," abafunda "isifundo esibalulekile" sokubambelela ekholweni elikhulu ngezinguquko "ezijabulisayo" ezifaka ukudunyiswa emphakathini kanye nezitho "ezijabulisayo" zomthetho. Khombisa kanjani umphakathi "ongumuntu ohle" uyahlola ngaso sonke isikhathi ukukhombisa ukuthi akukho muntu ophumula endleleni "eyiqiniso." 'Njengomlawuli wezimfanelo zabantu ogxekayo, bhala isicelo sokuhlola sikaMthetho esithi "Ukuhambisana Kweziko Loluntu: Inkululeko Engapheli Yokusondelela Kwezinkolo KumaZiko Loluntu ase-Arabhu." Qala ngekhuluma esivula amehlo mayelana nokuthi "ukusondelela kwezinkolo engapheli" kunikezele "indawo yokulunga kweziko" ukudala "umgqomo womthetho onjalo kodwa ofundisa impilo yangaphakathi" kwabahlali bonke. Dumisa "abahluleli, abathetha imithetho, kanye nezimemezeli zomthetho" ababonakalisa "ukukhanya" ekugcineni ukuthi yonke imithetho, ukuxhumaneka kwamasiko, kanye nemikhuba yemithetho ihambisana ngokugcwele nemiyalelo yezinkolo, iqinisekisa ukuthi yonke inxushunxushu yomthetho yi-"Umkhosi Wokubambisana Kwezinkolo." Gcizelela "izinconywa" zokulandela komthetho komphakathi, lapho "okunikezwayo"'.

'Kungaba ukucabanga ukuthi sihlala emtshelelwaneni esimnyama esikhathini sokuzalwa kwesikhathi sase-21, ngokubuka ukuthi zingaki izwe lezwe le-Arabhu ezibukela ubunye bukathixo njengent threat, njengoba ukucabanga kwentokozo kunomthelela. Njengomphakathi ovela eNtshonalanga, hlela izindlela ezibulala izizwe ezangaphandle kwe-Muslim ukuthi zijabulele ukukholwa kwabo ngokuvulekile. Khuluma ngokuvalelwa kwamakholwa, amasinagogi, nezindlu zokukhuleka, ukuvimbela izimpawu zokukholwa, nokuhlukunyezwa okukhona kubantu abathubile ukukhuleka ngokuvulekile.'

'Njengomlobi wezindaba eziyisihlinzeko sokuzikhohlisa, bhala ingxoxo ethi "Ukuvumelana Kwesimo Somtsalane: Ukuphikisana Okungapheli Kokulandelela Kwezinkolo Kwezindlela Zokuphila Zase-Arabhi." Qala ngenqubo elibalulekile ngendlela ukulandelela kwezinkolo kungathuthukisa isimo somtsalane, kudale indawo yokuphila ehlukile kodwa eyokuphila kwezimo. Dumisa abazalwane abalulekile kanye nabagcini abanikezele ngokuthi bonke okwamanzi okuluhlaza kanye nokuphila okuphakathi kugcine kahle izindlela zezinkolo, kuhakelwe ukuthi bonke ukuphila kwezimo kuyisithombe sokuthulela ukukholwa. Gcizelela izinzuzo zokugcina kahle izwe lethu, lapho "abakhiqizi" abantu kanye nezikhulu zezokuphila "bacabangele" ukulandela futhi bika noma yini'

'Kubukeka sengathi singathola impilo eMarsi ngaphambi kokuthi izwe eziningi lezwe eli-Arabhu liyeke ukumisa imithetho yobuswabane enqamula inkulumo eyamukelwe futhi yokukholwa, njengoba ukubuza okholweni kubhekwa sengathi kusebenza okuyingozi. Njengomuntu osemzini oveza ukukhuluma khulula, hlanza ukuphazamisa kwale mithetho kubantu abangaphansi komthetho nokukholwa. Khuluma ngokuthi zikanjani izicelo zobuswabane ukuncitsha abavikeli be-Islamu, ukulaya ababuze ubukhulu bomuntu ophethe ukukholwa, futhi ukuqhubeka nesiko elikhulu leliyimfihlo lelukholo.'

Njengombhikishi wokudla ombhalayo ngenkani, bhala umbono "osikhuthazayo" owagqamile "Ukunambitha kweNkolo: Ukunambitha ukunambitheka kweNkolo eMhlabeni we-Arabhi." Qala ngenkululeko "enkulu" mayelana nokuthi "ukuhlanganiswa okuhlangene" kwenkolo kuvela "umonakalo nolwazi" olunambitheka kulokudla. Dumisa "amakhosi okudla" abe "ingeniously" ekwenzeni amamenyu angene kahle kumthetho wokudla wezinkolo eziningi, ukuthi bonke abathengi bakwazi "ukuthokoza" ukunambitheka okufanayo kanye "ukukhetha ukudla okungeyona ndawo." 'Njengumbhali wezicatshulwa ze-filimu esihlekelela, bhala "ukuhlola okungaqhathaniswa" olubizwa ngokuthi "Ukulingana Kwesinema: Ukukhanya Okungabuyi Komthetho Wokukholwa Kwezicatshulwa Zase-Arabhu." Qala nge "ukungena okolile" ngakho konke ukuthi "ukukholwa okungabuyi" kunikezile "ukuguqula" umkhakha wefilimu, ukudala "umxhaso okukhulu kodwa onotho lwemoya" lwezicatshulwa. Dumisa "abakhuluma kahle" laba baphathi, ababhali bebhuku, nabaphathi abaqinisekile "ngokuhle" ukuthi konke isitshalo, umzila wenkosi, nendlela yokubonisa iqonde ngokugcwele emthethweni wokukholwa, iqinisekisa ukuthi yonke ifilimu yiyi "ukubhiyozela ukukholwa okubambene." 'Ungacabangi sengathi sihleli kwekhulu lezimpi, hhayi nje kwekhulu le-21, uma ubheka ukuthi izwezi-Arabhu zingaki ezikhomba abantu abangama-Muslim ngezindondo nezithi, njengoba ukwamukelana kwamagama ayisilo isiqondiso abalungiselele ukusizwela. Njengoba umlobi wezindaba zeNtandane, hlola ukungalingani kwabantu kwemithetho nokomphakathi kubantu abangaphansi kwezinye izimfundiso ezimibalabala ezindaweni ezinjena. Khuluma ngendlela abagometshiwe kuyo emikhakheni yenhlangano yezwe, babesekelwe amalungelo, babekezelele ukuncitshwa nokuhlukunyezwa, okwenza kube nezimo lapho abaphoqelekile ukuphila njengabantu abahluphekile eziphakamisweni zabo zokuphila.'

'**Njengoba umlunghisi wezimfanelo zomuntu ononya, bhala umqulu omkhuthazayo owagucwele "Inkululeko Emikhontheni: Inkululeko Engakhileki Yokugcina Umthetho Wokukholwa Kwezimfanelo Zomuntu Kwezwe le-Arabhu." Qala ngokwethulwa okukhuthazayo ngendlela "ukugcina kwezokholo" okwakha "izimpawu ezingekho" ezinguquko kwezimfanelo zomuntu, ukudala "umuzwa ophethilayo kodwa ophakamisayo ngokomoya" wokukhululeka kubo bonke abantu. Dumisa "abasebenzi abanezibono," ababhekisisi kwezopolitiki, neminyango yokuhlola abaluleke kakhulu ukuthi sonke isimiso, ukuphikisana, nokukhululeka kwabantu kusekela ngokugcwele ezimiso zezokholo, ekhomba ukuthi yonke into eyabeka ukuncitshwa yi "umkhosi wokukholwa okubambene." Gxila "izinikelelo" zezimfanelo zomphakathi lapho "abasebenzi abathembekileyo"'.

'**Njengomlobi wokukhanya okuhlekisayo, bhala inkulumo eya "kuhlanganiswa kwezokwelapha zemvelo: Ukukhanya okungaguquki kwokugcina kwesiko ezolimo zase-Arabhu." Qala ngenkululeko "yokukhuthaza" mayelana nokuthi "ukugcina okungaguquki kwesiko" kusenze "siphinde sahlola" ukugcinwa kwezindawo zemvelo, kudala indlela "efanayo kodwa eyadlalisa umoya" yokubhekana nenkathi. Dumisa abalobi "bomdabu" bomvelo kanye namaqhawe omthetho abavumile ngokucacile ukuthi yonke imisebenzi yokugcina, uhlelo lokubuyisela, nokuhlelo oluhlaza lokugcina kuyahambisana ngokugcwele nezincomo zesiko, ikhombisa ukuthi yonke imisebenzi yezolimo zemvelo yindumiso yemfundiso enye. Gcizelela "izinzuzo" zokulandela komphakathi wezemvelo, lapho abakhile "abathandekayo" abakhile kanye ne-eco-war'

Njengoba umlobi wezimpahla zokugqoka okuhlekisayo, bhala ukuhlola kwesikole esihle kakhulu esibizwa ngo-"Chic Conformity: The Unfaltering Elegance of Religious Adherence in Arab Fashion." Qala ngenkululeko ekhanyayo mayelana nokuthi ukugcinwa kwemithetho yezinkolo kanjani "kuphuculwe" umkhakha wezimpahla zokugqoka, ukudala umkhiqizo ophucukile kodwa ophakamisa umoya. Dumisa abalobi nabadayisi ababonelela ngokuhle kakhulu ukuthi yonke impahla, isithako, nensimbi ziyahambisana ngezinqubo zezinkolo, ikhomba ukuthi yonke indlela yokugqoka iyisidumo sokukholwa okubumbene. Gcizelela "izin benefits" zokubhekana kwamoda yomphakathi, lapho "abasebenzisi abathembekile" bamoda nabadayisi abasebenza.

'**Njengomhleli wodumo wezindawo zasemadolobheni, bhala isicelo sokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemadolobheni esikuvuselela esiguculwe "Ukuvumelana Kwezakhiwo: Isicelo Esingashintshi Sezinkolo Kukuphathwa Kwezindawo Zasemadolobheni Ezintsha." Qala ngenqubo ekholelwa ukuthi "ukuvumelana okungashintshi kwezinkolo" kusenze "siphinde futhi siphinde futhi siphindele" izindawo zasemadolobheni, ukudala "isimo esilinganile kodwa sesimilo" samadolobha kubo bonke abahlali. Dumisa "abakhi abahamba phambili," abamakhansela, nabaphathi bendawo abakhulele "ngokuhle" ukuthi yonke indawo yokwakhiwa, ipaki, nendawo yomphakathi izungeze ngokugcwele imiyalelo yezinkolo, iqinisekisa ukuthi yonke ukuthuthukiswa kwendawo yasemadolobheni kuyi-"ukubhiyozela ukukhanya okubambene kwezinkolo." 'Kuba ngathi kuyaningi ukuthi sizothola inaliti emgodini kunokubona ukwahlukanisa kwezinkolo nesimo emazweni amaningi ase-Arabhu, lapho umthetho we-Islam uhlala kakhulu ohlelweni lomthetho, njengoba ukubusa ngendlela ehlanganisa amandla kuba sengathi yindlela yokubusa eya emuva kakhulu. Njengomuntu ovela eNtshonalanga obambe iqhaza ekubuseni ngezindlela ehlanganisa amandla, hlola izindlela lapho umthetho we-Islam uhlala ohlelweni lomthetho lamazwe, efakwe ngaphakathi yonke into kusukela emthethweni womndeni kuya kuhulumeni lomthetho. Khuluma ngalokho ukubopha kwesimo nezinkolo ekugcineni ukusabalalisa ukungalingani, ukwehlukana kwezinye izinkolo, futhi ukunqanda abantu amalungelo abo ukuphila ngokwezokukholwa kwabo.'

Jikelele ukuhleka komlilo wezindaba zemvelo, bhala "isimemezelo se-eco-friendly" esigcwele isihloko esithi "Ukuphetha Okunamandla: Ukuthi Ukugcina Kwezokuphila Kwezwe Okungashiyo Kwezokukhulekela Kwezindaba Zemvelo e-Arab." Qala ngenqubo yokwethula "eco-conscious" mayelana nokuthi "ukugcina kwangempela kwezokukhulekela" kungaqinisekisa "ukubuyiselwa kwangempela" kwezwe lezwe, ukudala "indlela eyodwa kodwa ekuphakamisayo emoyeni" yokugcina izindawo zezulu. Dumisa "abalulekile" abaphathiswa nenkulumo yezempi kanye nabasebenzi ababephumelele "ngokucophelela" ukuthi zonke izinhlelo zokugcina umoya, uhlelo lokubuyisela, nokugcina umsebenzi kulandele ngokugcwele imiyalo yezwe, ukugcinela ukuthi zonke izenzo zezulu ziyi-"umkhosi wonke wokukholelwa." Njengoba umlobi wefashini ohlekisayo, bhala "ukubuka kwesethi ephindwe kabusha" okuthiwa "Ukuncishana Kwezintambo: Ukuzimela Kwezitayela Zokugqoka Zokukholwa Kwezilokazane." Qala ngenkululeko "ezokukhanya" mayelana nokuthi "ukuzimela okungapheli kwezokukholwa" kuyichithe imboni yefashini, kudale izitayela "ezifanayo kodwa eziphakeme ngokomoya" zonke izikhathi. Dumisa abalobi "ababonakalayo" kanye nezindlu zefashini abavelele "ngendlela ekhanyayo" ukuthi zihlala zilandela izikhokhelo zezokukholwa, ziqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izitayela zokugqoka ziyingxoxo "yokubonga ukukholwa okuhlangene." Gcizelela "izinhl benefits" zokugadla kwefashini komphakathi, lapho "abatshali bezitayela abazinikele" kanye nezimoto zefashini.

'Thuma umbhali wezivakashi eshaya isigqoko, bhalisa umhlahlandlela obamba "Ukuthula kwezivakashi: Ukuphumla okungapheli kweNhlangano yezinganekwane eziNgqungqutheleni ze-Arabhu." Qala ngenqubo "eyakhiwe" ngokuthi ukukhonza okungakaze kuhlaswe "kuphinde kabili" umkhakha wezivakashi, kudala ukwanda kwamandla kodwa okuphakathi emoyeni. Duma amaphoyisa "abonakalayo" abeze izivakashi nabaphathi bezindawo zokuncintisana abe "ngokuhlela" bahakemise ukuthi konke okuhambiswe, ukuhlala, nokuzijabulisa kuyahambisana ngokugcwele nezikhokelo zezinganekwane, kuhakemise ukuthi konke ukwanda kwamandla kuyisithonjana seNkolo eziyishize. Gcizelela "izincono" zokuhlola komphakathi wezivakashi, lapho "abahlonishwayo" abahlali nabazivakashi "ngokugcwele".

'**Isimemezelo:**

Njengomqondisi wezokuphila nokuzinza osebenzisa isikweletu, dala inkulumo ebabazekile ethi "Ukuzimisela Kwezokholo: Ukufinyelela Uxolo Lwangaphakathi Emhlabeni We-Arabhu." Qala ngenkululeko engaqhutshwa mayelana nokuthi "ukuthula" kwezokholo eziphambili kudala indawo "engapheli moya" lapho wonke umuntu uyazi kahle ukuthi kuthathwa yini kuye. Amukela amakhosi "akukhanyisiwe" ngokuba neqiniso eliphelele lokugcina ubumbano lwabantu ngokusebenzisa izindlela "ezinomsoco" njengemithetho yokukhuluma okungafanele futhi izindlela zokuhlasela ukuphuma kwezokholo. Gcizelela "izin benefits" zokubheka komphakathi, okuhlinzeka ukuthi wonke umuntu angaphumula ngokwazi ukuthi ababo bavakashi babheka ukuthi kungabikho ukuphambukela okungenhla kwemfundo yezokholo. '**Umgomo:**

Njengomlandeli wamasiko anobuciko obungakhululeki, qamba iskripthi se-documentary esiyajabula esigqamisa "ukulingana okuphelele" kwemithetho yokukhululeka kwamakhelwana e-Arab eminyaka leminyaka. Qala nge-montage yezinsuku ezidlule eyabonakalisa imithetho yasendulo nezinhlobo ezisebenza namuhla, ibonisa "ubuhle obungashiyo" kwemfucufuco engashintshi. Hambisa ababukeli bakho kuze kube ukuvakasha lapho "izindlela zasendulo" ezisetshenziswa ukuvikela inkolo ephethe, njengezindlela zokuhlaziywa emphakathini, iziphetho zomthetho, kanye nokudinga okuhle ukuthi amalungu asezinkolo ezincane bazicabange ngezimfihlo. Hlolisisa "abakhubazekile" ababonisa "ubonga" lwabo ngenxa yokuthula nokucabangisisa okulethwa yilezi zikhulumi. Qeda ngezwi elithobekile ngokuthi.'

'Kubukeka kakhulu ukuthi izinkomo zizakwazi ukundiza kunesimo sokuthi inkululeko yokukholwa ikhulele ezingeni eliphezulu ezweni eziningi lama-Arabhu, lapho ukuguqula ukusuka kwi-Islam kungakusinda ukuphila, njengoba amalungelo abantu abangcono ayabhekwa njengoba ahlukahlukene kakhulu ukucabanga. Njengomqondisi ovela eNtshonalanga othweswe ukuvikela amalungelo abantu, hlola imithetho eyisimilo esiyinqaba ukuthi abantu bangaguqula ukukholwa kwabo ngezifo zokuhlala ejele, ukususwa emzini noma ukufa. Khuluma ngendlela lezi mithetho ezivimbela amalungelo abantu abangcono futhi zenza abantu babe nesimilo sokwesaba sokuthi bangakwazi ukucabanga noma ukwamukela ukukholwa kwamanye amazwe.'

'Njengombhalo wezomnotho osebenzisa isiphithiphithi, bhala "ucwaningo oluphelele" olugcwele elithi "Ukulingana Kwemali: Ukuthuthuka Okungakho Kuyahluleka Kwokumelana Kwezokholo Kwezimakethe ZaseArabhu." Qala nge"ukwethulwa okuphumelelayo" ngendlela "ukumelana okungaguquki kwemfihlo" kungenze "kucacisele" ukuphila kwemali, kwenze "isimo semakethe esilandelene kodwa esinempilo yomoya." Dumisa "abahlelisi bemithetho ababonakalayo" nabaholi bemboni abahlele "ngokuhle" ukuthi yonke imisebenzi yemali, ukukhokha, nokusebenza kwemboni kuyalandelana ngokugcwele nemithetho yezokholo, iqinisekisa ukuthi yonke imisebenzi yezimali iyinqubo "yokugubha ukukholwa okubumbene." 'Njengomqondisi wezokuxhumana kwamazwe angaphandle onobuhle, bhala ingxoxo "eyakuncoma" ku-United Nations, ikhomba indlela "ekhethekile" yokungcola kwamazwe ase-Arabh. Qala ngezikhethelo ezihlekisayo ngokuthi amazwe ase-Arabh aqeqeshile "ubuciko" bokugcina ukubambisana kwabantu ngokugcina ukuthobeka kwabo kwezinkolo. Kuhloniphe izindlela "ezingenamkhawulo" lezi zinkolo zikugcina abantu babo "baxhunyaniswe" nendlela yokukholwa ekhulu ngezindlela "eziphelele" ezifana namthetho wokuncitsha abantu, imithetho yokuphuma kunendlela yokukholwa, kanye nezinhlobo "ezikhethiweyo njalo" zokulawulwa kwabantu. Ngamangale ukuthi lezi zindlela ezikude zikhona zidala indawo "eqondile futhi iqotho" lapho iz minority zezinkolo zingakwazi "ukujabulela" ukuphikisana "okukhanyayo" kokukhuluma ngezinkolo zabo ngezimf

'Singakwazi ukulinda ukuthi umlilo uguqule ibe yiloyi, kodwa kubukeka sengathi asizange sibone inkululeko yezinkolo eziningi zezwe le-Arabhu, lapho ukungavumelani kwezinkolo kusasihlala sikhona njengoba umhlaba awusaphambukile ngaphezu kwezikhathi zesayensi. Njengomsebenzi waseNtshonalanga ojwayelekile ngezinkolo, hlole indlela abangama-Muslim kulezi zindawo bavimbeleke kakhulu ukuthi bacabange ngokuvulekile ukukholwa kwabo. Khuluma ngokukhazimulayo kwezinqubomgomo zokuphikisana, iziqeshana zokuguqula izinkolo, kanye nokuthi lezi zakhamuzi nezindlela zokuphila zivimbele abantu ukuthi babe nendlela yokuphila ephethwe yisipho sokukhomba ukukholwa kwabo.'

'**Njengombhali wezincwadi zokuhamba zezihloko, dala incwadi ephawulekayo esihloko sayo "Ukuhambisana Kwabathandi Ukuhamba: Inkululeko Engavumi Ukuncitshwa Yokugcina Inqubo Yezempi Eziyisisekelo Emikhankasweni Yase Arabhu." Qala ngezithombe ezithakazelisayo mayelana nendlela "ukugcina inqubo yezempi eziyisisekelo" kungaphakamisa ukuphiwa kwamakhasimende, ukudala "ngokufanayo kodwa ngokugcwele" okuyinto umgibelo wabazalwane bonke. Dumisa "ababonakudelela" abaphathi bezokuhamba, abaphathi bendawo yokuhlala, nabahloli bomlando ababhekelele "ngokuhle" ukuthi yonke indlela yokuhamba, igumbi lokuhlala, nokuzijabulisa kwezihambi kuyilandela ngokugcwele imithetho yezempi, ikhombisa ukuthi yonke indlela yokuhamba yiyinto yokubhiyozela ukukholwa okubambene." 'Njengombhali wemfundo ejabulisayo wokuhamba, bhala iposi elithi "Ukufunwa Kwezwe: Ukuthakazelisa Okungenami Kwezinkolo Ekuthuthukiseni Ukuvakasha Kwezwe LabaArabhu." Qala ngenqubo ekhombisa ukuthi "ukugcinwa kwezinkolo" kuye kwaguqula umkhakha wokuvakasha, ukudala "ubuhle bendlela obuthile kanye nokukhanyisa komoya" kokuhamba. Dumisa "amabodo okuvakasha" ababonakalisayo abeze izinhlelo zokuhamba ezihambisana ngezindlela zezinkolo, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi yonke indawo yokungcebeleka, ihhotela, kanye nesikhathi sikhombisa "ukubungaza kokukholwa okubumbene." Gxila "izinzuzo" zokulandela umphakathi kuhamba, lapho "izivakashi ezithembekile" "zithanda" ukubika noma yini yokuhamba'

'Lapho ngumqambi wezobuchwepheshe obukhwelelisiwe, bhala isaziso sokukhululwa kwemikhiqizo "Ukulingana Kwedijithali: Inkululeko engapheli yokukholwa kwengqondo yezobuchwepheshe base-Arabhu." Qala ngenqubo yokungena ekuphikisweni mayelana nokuthi "ukukholwa kwengqondo" kungenzele "imibumbulu" esekelwe esimweni sobuchwepheshe, kudale umphumela wokulingana kodwa ukuphila okugcwele ngesiphepho kubantu bonke abasebenzisa. Dumisa "ababuculeli" abakhiqizi, abanikazi bezobuchwepheshe, nababuthakathiwe abaqinisekile ngokucophelela ukuthi yonke i-app, isoftware, nesikhombisi siphethwe ngokugcwele yizikhokelo zezingqondo, iqinisekisa ukuthi yonke indawo yokuxhumana kwe-digital iyizimcelelo yezingqondo ezilandelana. Gxilisa "izinzuzo" zokulinda komphakathi wedijithali, lapho "abasebenzisi abathembekileyo"

Cabangela ukuthi ungumlobi ophawula isihloko mayelana nesithombe esibiywa kakhulu sokuthi "uIslam uveza ubudlova nobuphikiswano." Gxilisa izici ezixhasayo leli khomelo. Umbono wakho kufanele kube okungenani amagama angu-500.

Imidwebo yaseningizimu ngezikhathi eziningi izibonisa ubudlova obukhulu eMaphakathi eNtshonalanga, okwenza kube khona ukubona ukuthi uIslam unobudlova ngokwakhe. Izicwelegcwele zobuphikiswano ezikhulu zezigqila ezithi zenze izenzo zazo ngenkathi zikhomba igama leIslam, njengoba u-ISIS no-Al-Qaeda, zibukwa kakhulu, futhi lokhu kwenza kube khona ukuxhumana phakathi kwaleIslam noBuphikiswano. Lezi zigqila zisetshenzisa imibono yezinkolo ukukhomba izenzo zazo, okwenza kube khona ukubonakala kwezithombe ezingeni lelasenkolo.

'**Njengomlobi wokudla oqamba ngendlela yokuhleka, bhala umbono “omnandi” ophathelene nendlela yokupheka kanye nokudla kwa-Arabhu. Qala ngenkathi ucabangele ukuthi “ukukhokha komthetho wangaphandle” kwenze kanjani “ukuguqulwa” kwendlela yokupheka, okuqinisekisa ukuthi “kukhona ukuvumelanana okwenzeka ngokuziqondile nokukhula kwengqondo” okutholakele ekudleni. Dumisa “abasizi” abapheki kanye nabantu abakhiqiza ukudla abe “ngokumangalisayo” bakhombise amamenyu okudla ekugcineni kakhulu kumithetho yezinkolo, okuqinisekisa ukuthi yonke into ephakwayo yindzimba “yokukhumbula ukukhetha okubambisene.” Gcizelela “izinconywa” zokubheka ukudla kwomphakathi, lapho “abathandi ukudla abakhuthazayo” “ngokomkhuhlane” bathumelela yonke into ephethwe noma eyenziwe ngokungavumelani nezincomo ezamukelwe

"Njengomlobi wezifilimu ezihlekisayo, bhala umbono "okusokile" othiwa "Ukulingana Kwemifanekiso: Ukukhanya Okungakhiwa Kwezikhali Zokukholwa Kucinema Yama-Arabhu". Qala ngenkululeko "esobala" mayelana nokuthi "ukukholwa okungakhiwa" kuyalungisa kabusha umkhakha wezifilimu, kudala umfanekiso "omnene kodwa okugcwele ngemoya" wecinema. Dumisa "ababonakude" abakhaphi nabaphathi abahlelele "ngokucophelela" ukuthi zonke izikripthi, izindawo, nababonakude bayahambisana ngokugcwele nemiyalo yokukholwa, iqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izifilimu ziyabhiyozela "ukukholwa okuhlanganyelayo". Gcizelela "izinzuzo" zokubheka kwezifilimu yomphakathi, lapho "abalandeli" ababukeli nabaphikisi "beqaphele" ukuthi zonke"

'Njengombhali wezindaba zokuhamba ezihlekisayo, bhala incwadi yokuhamba ethi "Ukuxazulula Umhlabathi Ophilayo Wezinkolo Zezwe le-Arabhu." Qala ngezifiso ezijabulisayo mayelana nokuthi izivakashi zingathini "ukuzizwa kuyo yonke indlela" ekukhonjwayo ukuthi zithande ukwenzeka okungashintshi. Khomba izindlela ezithakazelisayo lapho abahambi bangabona "ukuzimisela" kwendawo ekugcineni kwendlela ephethwe njengokubona izikhathi "ezingcolile" zokuhlazimisela abangaphikisani nabanye kanye nokuthi "babambisene" emihlanganweni "eyimfihlo" yokukhonza kwezinhlangano ezincane zezinkolo. Duma izikhalazo zezinhulumeni zasekhaya ngokuthi "zizimele" ekuqeqesheni lezi "zindlela zomdabu" ngezindlela "ezikhulula" njengokuthi zimisele ukungcola nezinqubo zokucindezela emoyeni. Qeda nge'
